> Sunhawk: You do realize most of this stuff was obsolete 6 months ago
> don't you?
>

{Talos}
Bridge

    Talos examined the console as the first flickers of life returned to the
rewired system, alot of the starboard autoguns had been damaged if not
utterly destroyed in the harsh landing, the port side auto guns number at
best two with a third that seemed to be offline.

    From a defensive stand point the ship could hold off a few attackers for
a few minutes but he didn't dare assume Megatron would send one or two of
the scum at them, no Megatron would send all his followeres to get the job
done, bullies always were alot braver when they held strength in numbers.
Shaking his head he rose walking past the other bots still working stopping
a moment to listen to Sunhawks words, "We'll see, as far as things go
Sunhawk you're on a clean slate with me, step out of line and you'll get
your wish of a stay in the brig but I don't see that happening any time
soon."

    Walking on he moved deeper into the ship holding onto a wall as the hall
was tilted, it hadn't been a level crash either, they must have struck
something or simply the ground torn by the ships force had created something
to bank it's course. In any case he moved on checking on the damages as he
went and looking for any other bots that might have missed the call in...
